mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure buttons and links are larger for easier tapping on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and consider lazy loading for better performance.
seoOptimizationTip: Use more targeted keywords in headings and meta descriptions to improve search ranking.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by adding more visual hierarchy to enhance user interaction.
bookingFlowTip: Consider adding guest reviews or ratings to the booking page to improve confidence.
tips: Consider integrating more interactive elements like a room configurator or virtual tour.
